Summary: Bight green helicopter size no sound and had a flame-like trail
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving with my Friend in copperas cove texas when we noticed a large green object moving slowly across the sky. It was around midnight so I thought kt was just a plane but it was too close to the ground and not as large as one. It was a really bright green I was surprised no one else stopped to look at it really it was that strange. It seemed to have a flame trail behind it and shaped kinda like oval. I stopped to tale a picture to but then it just vanished in a blink of a eye. I was very baffled by this because there was a car behind me but I don't think they saw it and I don't think my friend noticed the UFO either
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Copperas Cove
There were no other sightings in Copperas Cove on or around June 15th 2013
